messages.title: THE PROBLEM WITH BREXIT
messages.content: Don't fall for the "Get Brexit Done" Lie! We know most of you, however you voted in 2016, are fed up with Brexit and want it to "just go away." But here’s the thing—getting it "over the line" will not get it done. Whether we leave with Boris' deal, Labour's deal or No Deal, we will still spend the next decade negotiating our future. Brexit will continue to drain government time and resources and the economy with continue to stagnate.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Properly fund the NHS & Mental health
Stop Brexit and start investing in our public services

issues.brexitEurope: Don't fall for the "Get Brexit Done" Lie! If you are fed up with Brexit, then we need to get Brexit gone. If we revoke article 50 from day one, we can start tackling the real and critical problems facing our nation. The only way to do this is to vote for the Liberal Democrats - and for Sammy Barry - on December 12th!

leaflet.personalStatement: "I believe that if you want to make the world better, you dig where you stand"

contactInformation.address: Published and promoted by Lloyd Harris on behalf of Sammy Barry (Liberal Democrats) at 49 Mortimer Hill, Tring HP23 5JA, Printing by Solopress, 9 Stock Road, SS2 5QF.

images.caption: SAMMY BARRY with supporters, wearing Liberal Democrats pins.
